title: Review Contract for Risks
description: An agent must review a client contract to identify potential risks or unfavorable clauses.

tasks.description: Scan the contract for specific keywords like 'indemnity', 'liability', 'termination', and 'exclusivity'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the clauses containing these keywords.

tasks.description: Analyze the identified clauses to assess if they are standard or potentially risky.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent flags a clause with 'unlimited liability' as high-risk.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report of the identified risks for review by the legal team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a concise report highlighting the risky clauses.
